name: SwingShot
description:
A Top Down Shooter, With A Twist! (Literally)

Spin around and try and hit the zombies to the best of your abilities! To help with aiming you can temporarily slow down time, making it easier to hit the enemies!

Controls :

S or Left Mouse - Shoot

C or Right Mouse - Slow Motion

Feedback is highly appreciated so if you have any, leave it in the comments down below!

Credits : 

Music : Joshua Mclean - Flying Flames http://mrjoshuamclean.com/royalty-free-music/?genre=Rock

Shooting And Explosions - Q009 https://opengameart.org/content/q009s-weapon-sounds

Zombie Sounds - Michel Baradari https://opengameart.org/content/15-monster-gruntpaindeath-sounds

Wind Ambience - Premium Beat https://www.premiumbeat.com/blog/free-ambient-background-tracks/
